frame.name: Criminal_investigation
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes the process that involves the inquiry and determination by an authority, the <fen>Investigator</fen>, of the circumstances surrounding an <fen>Incident</fen> perpetrated by a <fen>Suspect</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Investigator">The police</fex> are <t>investigating</t> <fex name="Inc">the bank's reported loss of several thousand dollars from their downtown branch's top security vault</fex>. <fex name="Sus">DNI</fex> </ex> <ex><fex name="Investigator">Authorities</fex> are <t>investigating</t> <fex name="Inc">several murders</fex>. <fex name="Sus">DNI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Investigator
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Investigator</fen> is the person or agency that investigates the <fen>Suspect</fen> of a crime (<fen>Incident</fen>).</def-root>

FE.name: Incident
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Investigator</fen> attempts to determine the exact circumstances surrounding the <fen>Incident</fen>, which is typically a criminal act (murder, robbery) or the result of such an act (death, loss of money).</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>When the <fen>Investigator</fen> investigates the <fen>Incident</fen>. <ex>Our guys are <fex name="Time">currently</fex> <t>investigating</t> her disappearance.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of the investigation. <ex>The police carried out a <fex name="Dur">two-year</fex> <t>investigation</t> into terrorist kidnappings.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Suspect
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes the <fen>Suspect</fen> that is investigated by the <fen>Investigator</fen>. <ex>The police are <t>investigating</t> <fex name="Suspect">Dr. Phil</fex>.</ex></def-root>
